title: Wolf in the Light Stars Live W
creator: Hunter Apps

extendedInfo.description: All my Live Wallpaper are Free for youset your prefered resolution and enjoy with the best live wallpaper select for you.This free app is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and/or home screen. Some info regards ads into this appWe want to keep the app completely free, In order to keep the app 100% free is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and/or home screen. This will help keep this app 100% free and help us bring you more cool apps like this in the future.You can delete the search shortcuts easily and without any effect for our app. (Drag & Drop to the garbage).You can optout notification ads from:Leadbolt Optout: http://opt.leadbolt.com/SendDroid Optout: http://senddroid.com/opt-out/Airpush Optout : http://www.airpush.com/optoutTags : Live Wallpaper Sky Night Blue animals nature white

reviews.title: Fish4patti
reviews.comment: No good. Wolf needs 2 move or do something. This is not live wallpaper. Most all the wallpaper I\'ve seen by U needs improvement. Sorry but true.

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: I find this unacceptable and blurry I hate this so called live wallpaper it needs more movement and I recommend you not to use this app!!!

reviews.title: Uninstalling
reviews.comment: Sorry I\'m getting rid of it. It has silly adds and doesn\'t even let you chose the size-no tablet options or anything! It\'s a good idea but there are better wallpapers than this. Don\'t waist your space!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Complete crap
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t even deserve one star. It doesn\'t fit the whole screen and the wolf doesn\'t even move! Do not install!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Had to uninstall it...
reviews.comment: I have TrustGo security on my phone,and it said it was a high risk,so I uninstalled to protect my phone number.This app can leak your phone number onto third party websites,so you may start recieving spam texts and phone calls.Do not download,unless you like spam.I would have really loved to have this as my wallpaper,as I love wolves,and the night sky,but it is a high risk of putting your phone number in danger.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: love it
